messages.update:
Mech & Magic is now 1.12.2! Enjoy!
Visit us on the Official Server via the main menu!

mod.name: Minecraft Forge - 2607
mod.description: It loads the things.

mod.name: Actually Additions
mod.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mod.name: Akashic Tome
mod.description: The book of books.

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: Astikoor
mod.description: Astikoor Mod

mod.name: Astral Sorcery
mod.description: Magic mod that draws power from stars and their constellations

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: Bed Bugs
mod.description: Adds a button and command to leave the bed/server when stuck!

mod.name: Better Builder's Wands
mod.description: Wands that allow placing of multiple blocks at a time

mod.name: Better Placement
mod.description: Syncs block placement to cursor movement, allowing easier and faster building.

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft. This time with a fancy number in front.

mod.name: Carry On
mod.description: Carry On is a simple mod that improves game interaction by allowing players to pick up, carry, and place single block Tile Entities using only their empty hands.

mod.name: Crop-Eating Animals
mod.description: Animals harvest crops by themself and start to make babies.

mod.name: ChickenChunks
mod.description: Advanced chunkloading management Credits: Sanguine - Texture Supporters:

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Adds in tons of fancy blocks for decoration, crafted using the Chisel.

mod.name: Chisels & Bits
mod.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mod.name: Chococraft 3
mod.description: Chocobos in Minecraft

mod.name: Clay Bucket
mod.description: Adds a clay bucket for early game.

mod.name: Clock HUD
mod.description: A simple clock GUI to check the time.

mod.name: CoFH World
mod.description: Provides advanced and highly customizable world generation capabilities.

mod.name: Colossal Chests
mod.description: For when regular chests are too small

mod.name: Cooking for Blockheads
mod.description: Adds a cooking book and multiblock kitchens that only shows recipes you can make with what you currently have in your inventory.

mod.name: CosmeticArmorReworked
mod.description: This mod allows you to wear two sets of armor, one for display, one for function. You can also hide armor for your skin. For PVP, you can stop the mod from functioning on your client side.

mod.name: CraftTweaker2
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: CTM
mod.description: Allows resource packs to add connected textures, emissive rendering, and much more.

mod.name: Cyclic
mod.description: Items, inventory features, world generation, simple machines, gameplay tweaks, new villagers, key bindings, and more. See config to disable absolutely anything. Report issues and suggestions to https://github.com/PrinceOfAmber/Cyclic/issues

mod.name: Bailey's Dailies
mod.description: Daily quests for hunting, gathering, and exploring the wonderful world of Minecraft.

mod.name: Dark Utilities
mod.description: A mod that adds a bunch of new utilities to the game.

mod.name: Draconic Evolution
mod.description: This is a mod that was originally made for the Tolkiencraft mod pack but it has since evolved way beyond that. This mod adds a lot of extremely expensive and powerful end game items as well as a lot of random useful bits and pieces.

mod.name: Embers
mod.description: Dwarven-style Magitech Mod

mod.name: Enderfuge
mod.description: Increased output from smelting vanilla armor/weapons.

mod.name: EnderStorage
mod.description: Stores your stuff in the END!

mod.name: Ender Utilities
mod.description: Some random, hopefully fun, and possibly even useful utilities (Modjam 4)

mod.name: EvilCraft
mod.description: An evil mod for Minecraft.

mod.name: Extra Rails
mod.description: Additional Minecart rails.

mod.name: Extra Utilities 2
mod.description: A bunch of useful things.

mod.name: Extreme Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) and Tesla power. This is a port of the 1.7.10 mod Big Reactors from ErogenousBeef

mod.name: Fast Leaf Decay
mod.description: Increases leaf decay rates. Check out the config to change the decay rate!

mod.name: Flexible Tools
mod.description: Tools with a bunch of upgrades and abilities.

mod.name: Friendly Fire
mod.description: Stop hurting your friends :'(

mod.name: Fuel Canister
mod.description: Adds the fuel canister which can be filled with coal and then used as fuel.

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: Gravel Ores
mod.description: Simple gravel ores that appear on the surface.

mod.name: Harvest
mod.description: Right click crop harvesting

mod.name: Horse Power
mod.description: A mods that adds horse powered blocks.

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: Immersive Petroleum
mod.description: Adds oil and oil processing features to Immersive Engineering.

mod.name: Immersive Tech
mod.description: More tech for IE

mod.name: Industrial Foregoing
mod.description: A small reinvention of Minefactory Reloaded.

mod.name: Iron Backpacks
mod.description: Adds tiered backpacks and a system of modular upgrades to go with them!

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: JEI Integration
mod.description: JEI Integrations is the predecessor to NEI Integrations created by Tonius for Minecraft 1.7.10. It adds various tooltips, additional support for recipe handlers in Just Enough Items (JEI) and some various other features (Coming Soon...)

mod.name: Just Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mod.name: JustTheTips
mod.description: Adds some tips to loading screens.

mod.name: Less Forgiving Void
mod.description: Makes the void hate you a little more than Forgiving Void (and vice-versa).

mod.name: Magical Psi
mod.description: Magical Psionic Spellcasting Instruments

mod.name: Mod Name Tooltip
mod.description: Shows the mod an ItemStack is from on its tooltip.

mod.name: Mod Tweaker
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for CraftTweaker, a recipe manipulator utility for Minecraft. It allows you to modify the recipes of other mods that add their own crafting mechanics

mod.name: Morph-o-Tool
mod.description: The wrench to end all wrenches.

mod.name: NetherPortalFix
mod.description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

mod.name: OpenBlocks
mod.description: All the things you never thought you will ever need

mod.name: OreGen
mod.description: One mod for generating ores used by most Tech-Mods.

mod.name: Psi
mod.description: Psionic Spellcasting Instruments

mod.name: QuantumStorage
mod.description: A mod that adds a Deep Storage Unit to hold all the things

mod.name: Quark
mod.description: Small things.

mod.name: Redstone Arsenal
mod.description: Behold the Redstone (Flux) Revolution - provides Flux-Infused Tools and Armor!

mod.name: Redstone Flux
mod.description: The Redstone Flux API - the cornerstone of Energy Transfer in modded Minecraft since 1.6.4.

mod.name: Redstone Paste
mod.description: Adds a paste form of redstone, which can stick to various surfaces.

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: Roots 2
mod.description: Druidic magic mod.

mod.name: Scaling Health
mod.description: Extra health for players and/or mobs!

mod.name: Secret Rooms 2
mod.description: This mod adds a variety of cool blocks that camouflage themselves to the surrounding world. All of these blocks have extremely useful functions that allow you to simply hide your diamonds, or punish all who dare try to get to them. Hidden doors, pressure plates, hidden levers and more!

mod.name: Signals
mod.description: Mod that adds OpenTTD/Factorio style signaling and more!

mod.name: Silent's Gems: Extra Parts
mod.description: Official tool part add-on pack for Silent's Gems

mod.name: Silent's Gems
mod.description: When diamonds won't cut it.

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: A carttastic mod adding a near infinite number of carts possible to the game, through the creation of modular carts.

mod.name: SwingThroughGrass
mod.description: Don't let the grass be between you and your prey!

mod.name: The One Probe
mod.description: A Probe to rule them all!

mod.name: Thermal Dynamics
mod.description: Thermal meets Dynamic - provides options for transporting items, fluids, and Redstone Flux!

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expanding Minecraft Thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mod.name: Thermal Foundation
mod.description: The foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!

mod.name: Corail Tombstone
mod.description: Place a tombstone with the lost items when a player die, with features like decorative graves, auto-equip, key to access, wat...

mod.name: TorchMaster
mod.description: Adds a special torch which prevents mobs from spawning in a configurable range

mod.name: TrashSlot
mod.description: Adds a trash slot to the inventory screen that allows deletion of unwanted items.

mod.name: The Twilight Forest
mod.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mod.name: UniDict
mod.description: a mod about unifying all the things.

mod.name: Useful Nullifiers
mod.description: Nullifiers to help get rid of all those items, fluids, and energy.

mod.name: Vampirism
mod.description: Adds vampirism features

mod.name: Veining
mod.description: Uncovers an ancient enchantment allows you to mine veins in a single swing.

mod.name: ViesCraft
mod.description: Airships through the eyes of Viesis!

mod.name: Waystones
mod.description: Teleport back to activated waystones. For Survival, Adventure or Servers.

mod.name: Whole Tree Axe
mod.description: New axe that harvests a tree with one click.

mod.name: XL Food Mod
mod.description: A mod that adds more foods and crops to the game.

mod.name: YABBA
mod.description: Yet Another Better Barrel Attempt

mod.name: Yummy
mod.description: More realistic food.

mod.name: -----Maps-----
mod.description: Choose any 1 Map for your instance. May cause performance issues.

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore. JourneyMap API: v1.12-1.4. Built: 2017-10-26-16:31:11.

mod.name: MapWriter
mod.description: An open source mini map mod

mod.name: Xaero's Minimap
mod.description: The most "vanilla-looking" minimap for Minecraft.

mod.name: -----Quality of Life-----
mod.description: Making things a little easier..

mod.name: Bad Wither No Cookie! Reloaded
mod.description: A simple mod to silence the Wither and Dragon broadcast sounds.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: MoreOverlays
mod.description: Adds some overlays from NEI (Mob spawns, Chunk Bounds, Item Search)

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.
Making things a little easier.

mod.name: Blur
mod.description: Adds a blurry background when viewing GUIs

mod.name: Dynamic Lights
mod.description: portable and moving lightsources

mod.name: FoamFix
mod.description: Questionable "performance improvements" that are not in Forge for probably very good reasons.

mod.name: AutoRegLib
mod.description: Automatically item, block, and model registration for mods.

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Bookshelf is a core/library mod, which adds new features and tools into the game for other content creators to work with. The primary focus of this project is to make use of the combined strength of the modded community to create wonderful tools that everyone can use.

mod.name: Brandon's Core
mod.description: This is the core mod that will be used by most of my mods from now on

mod.name: CodeChicken Lib
mod.description: CodeChickenLib is a library of systems to help make various aspects of minecraft modding easier. It contains libraries for 3D math and transformations, model rendering, packets, config, colours, asm and a few other things..

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Required for all CoFH Mods. Also provides some customization options for Minecraft.

mod.name: CommonCapabilities
mod.description: Forge Capabilities that can be shared by multiple mods

mod.name: CTD Core
mod.description: A library mod for mods by TheMasterGeneral and/or Chase the Dragon members.

mod.name: Cyclops Core
mod.description: Coremod for EvilCraft, Integrated Dynamics and others.

mod.name: Shadowfacts' Forgelin
mod.description: Kotlin helper library for Forge.

mod.name: Hammer Core
mod.description: Core used by most of Pengu's Mods.

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.name: MTLib
mod.description: Library files for Minetweaker Addons

mod.name: OpenModsLib
mod.description: Boring stuff for all that silly Open* mods

mod.name: p455w0rd's Library
mod.description: Library component for all of p455w0rd's mods

mod.name: Reborn Core
mod.description: Reborn Core is a library used for many of the Tech Reborn team's mods, including Tech Reborn, Quantum Storage, Fluxed Redstone, Hardcore Map Reset, and many more.

mod.name: ShadowMC
mod.description: A library mod required for all my other mods.

mod.name: ShetiPhian-Core
mod.description: Core set of files needed by ShetiPhians mods

mod.name: Silent Lib
mod.description: Shared library for SilentChaos512's mods.

mod.name: Tesla Core Lib
mod.description: Just the most awesome lib mod out there!

mod.name: WanionLib
mod.description: Shared Code Library Used by (not)all WanionCane mods!

mod.name: Zero CORE
mod.description: Utility mod and multiblock API

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: PackGuard
mod.description: Monitors the modpack for user modifications, and tells the user to not report any errors if anything has been changed!

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: Login Shield
mod.description: protects users from taking damage between when they login and they can start interacting with the world

mod.name: FTBU Local Files - Server Only
mod.description: Includes the Official Pack Server! WARNING: This will overwrite your servers
